body:
Hello @kpflugshaupt! Thanks for opening this PR. We checked the lines you've touched for [PEP 8](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0008) issues, and found:



* In the file [`pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py):

> [Line 456:36](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L456): [E241](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E241) multiple spaces after ','
> [Line 458:33](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L458): [E241](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E241) multiple spaces after ','
> [Line 460:60](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L460): [W291](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20W291) trailing whitespace
> [Line 461:80](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L461): [E501](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E501) line too long (118 > 79 characters)
> [Line 462:80](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L462): [E501](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E501) line too long (109 > 79 characters)
> [Line 463:20](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L463): [E211](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E211) whitespace before '('
> [Line 464:7](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L464): [E221](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E221) multiple spaces before operator
> [Line 467:80](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L467): [E501](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E501) line too long (80 > 79 characters)
> [Line 468:1](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L468): [W293](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20W293) blank line contains whitespace
> [Line 469:80](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L469): [E501](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E501) line too long (82 > 79 characters)
> [Line 470:80](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L470): [E501](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E501) line too long (82 > 79 characters)
> [Line 472:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L472): [E221](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E221) multiple spaces before operator
> [Line 475:33](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L475): [W291](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20W291) trailing whitespace
> [Line 477:1](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/2c2500b04db9d6800a4d73a350efee0eb4984f2d/pandas/tests/groupby/test_categorical.py#L477): [W293](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20W293) blank line contains whitespace
Will fix the PEP 8 issues ASAP (sorry -- did not check the test source...)
